item.title: Fitria add a quote by dee
item.description: "Seindah apa pun huruf terukir, dapatkah ia bermakna apabila tak ada jeda? Dapatkan ia dimengerti jika tak ada spasi? Bukankah kita baru bisa bergerak jika ada jarak? Dan saling menyayang bila ada ruang?" -- dee

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Bermimpilah, karena Tuhan akan memeluk mimpi-mimpi itu." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
Fitria add a quote by Fahd Djibran
item.description: "seperti udara, aku mencintaimu, selalu terikat ruang. seperti cuaca, aku menyayangimu selalu terikat waktu. seperti hujan, aku membencimu, sewaktu-waktu." -- Fahd Djibran

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Ahmad Fuadi
item.description: "Orang boleh menodong senapan, tapi kalian punya pilihan, untuk takut atau tetap tegar." -- Ahmad Fuadi

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Andrew Wolfe
item.description: "A book without words is like love without a kiss; it's empty." -- Andrew Wolfe

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Fitria add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Semua perjalanan hidup adalah sinema. Bahkan lebih mengerikan. Darah adalah darah, dan tangis adalah tangis. Tak ada pemeran pengganti yang akan menanggung sakitmu." -- Dee

item.title: Fitria add a quote by dee
item.description: "kenangan itu cuma hantu di sudut pikir. selama kita diam dan ngga berbuat apa-apa, selamanya dia tetap jadi hantu, ngga akan pernah jadi kenyataan." -- dee

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Dee
item.description: "rasa memiliki itu hidup seperti sel. semula satu dan kemudian terpecah jadi seribu satu. dan aku menyimpan sel-sel yang sangat sehat. ia akan terpecah diluar kendali cinta itu sendiri. sel ini terus bertambah dan merambah. mereka hidup melingkari kita, semenjak kita saling mencinta. suka tak suka." -- Dee

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
Fitria add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description:
"Sebab setelah hujan selalu ada seseorang yang datang sebagai pelangi, dan memelukmu.
: Aku ingin orang itu selamanya aku. " -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Hiduplah Untuk Memberi yang Sebanyak-banyaknya, Bukan untuk Menerima yang Sebanyak-banyaknya. (Pak Harfan)" -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Shelby Foote
item.description: "A university is just a group of buildings gathered around a library." -- Shelby Foote

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Death ends a life, not a relationship." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Emily Giffin
item.description: "You can only control your own actions. Not other people’s reactions." -- Emily Giffin

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Dante Alighieri
item.description: "Do not be afraid; our fate Cannot be taken from us; it is a gift." -- Dante Alighieri

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Cicero
item.description: "If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need." -- Cicero

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Horace Mann
item.description: "A house without books is like a room without windows." -- Horace Mann

item.title: Fitria add a quote by Charles W. Eliot
item.description: "Books are the quietest and most constant of friends; they are the most accessible and wisest of counselors, and the most patient of teachers." -- Charles W. Eliot
